description.en: Hong knows she's into women, but it's easy for Yesul to mistake Hong's actions for friendly behaviour. Will the two every become closer than friends? This is the story of Hong's first love, and her group of friends figuring out who they are and what adults they invision on becoming.
description.es-la: "Creo que hay alguien que me gusta..." A Hong le gustan las chicas, y Yeseul cree que los sentimientos de Hong son de amistad. ¿Podrán las dos convertirse en algo más que amigas...? Esta es la historia de Hong, quien se enamoró por primera vez, y de sus amigas del último año escolar que también tienen sus propias preocupaciones.

altTitles.th: เกมกลคนอัจฉริยะ

description.en: Sitting by himself in the back of the class, 10th-grader Yugi always had his head in some game–until he solved the Millennium Puzzle, an Egyptian artifact containing the spirit of a master gambler from the age of the pharaohs! Awakened after three thousand years, the King of Games possesses Yugi, recklessly challenging bullies and evil-doers to the Shadow Games, where the stakes are high, and even the most ordinary bet may result in weirdness and danger beyond belief! Let the games… begin!
description.pt-br: O estudante Yugi Mutou passou a maior parte de seu tempo sozinho jogando jogos - até que ele resolveu o Enigma do Milênio, um artefato egípcio misterioso! Possuída pelo quebra-cabeça, Yugi se torna o Yu-Gi-Oh(O Rei dos Jogos), e irá enfrentar os desafios dos Jogos das Sombras - Jogos mortais com grandes apostas e altos riscos, como apostar a sua alma e a alma de seus queridos amigos! O mangá contém novas histórias não vistas no anime, incluindo a origem de Yugi e seus amigos!

description.en: A god created AOTU World and established the 7 Oracles to rule it on behalf of this god. The poor and rich, enslaved and free, suffering and happiness, destruction and birth: every status is ordained by God. Mortals can only accept, but cannot resist. However, God has given his people the opportunity to change their fate through "AOTU Contest." The contestants use their unique "ability" gifted by the Contest System and inbate wisdom and courage in hopes of winning the competition and becoming the world's ruler.
description.vi:
Thần Sáng Thế của thế giới Ao Đột là một vị thần rất ngẫu hứng.
Ngài tạo ra vô số hành tinh và con dân trong thế giới Ao Đột, nhưng lại cai quản họ một cách tùy ý không theo quy luật --- có hành tinh màu mỡ tươi đẹp, có hành tinh cằn cỗi hoang vu, có con dân được hưởng tự do hạnh phúc, có con dân lại phải chịu sưu thuế nặng nề và lao động khổ sai.
Thần Sáng Thế thành lập ra Bảy Thần Sử, để họ thay mình thực hiện ý chỉ của thần
Thế nhưng cũng không phải là Thần Sáng Thế hoàn toàn không cho con dân mình cơ hội --- nếu như ai muốn thay đổi vận mệnh, thực hiện nguyện vọng của bản thân, vậy thì hãy tham gia "Đại chiến Ao Đột" đi! Các thí sinh sẽ được hệ thống đại chiến ban cho "năng lực đặc biệt", rèn luyện và vận dụng năng lực của riêng mình, không ngừng chiến đấu vượt qua thử thách. Chỉ cần là người chiến thắng sau cùng trong đại chiến Ao Đột là có thể đạt được tất cả, đồng thời được ban cho quyền thay mặt thần cai trị thế giới giống như Bảy Thần Sử.
Tuy nhiên, những điều trên chỉ là quan niệm giả dối, cuộc đấu này đã định sẵn không hề có kẻ chiến thắng. Cho tới khi nhân vật chính của chúng ta - Kim, xuất hiện trên sân đấu.

title.en: Yuuki Yuuna wa Yuusha de Aru - The Hero Club's Activity Record, Ten Years Later (Doujinshi)

altTitles.en: Yuki Yuna is a Hero - The Hero Club's Activity Record, Ten Years Later
A Rough Lady is All Bothered

altTitles.ja: あらくれお嬢様はもんもんしている

description.en:
Meet Tsubaki Kuchinashi, the Manhater Prince. Beautiful and popular, Tsubaki's core strength in high school comes from her position as the principal's granddaughter - suffice it to say, but any student or teacher who even looks at her the wrong way could be expelled at a moment's notice.   
  
Meet Tadashi Kiritsu, the head of the Public Morals Committee. As sharp and rigid as his glasses, Tadashi despises Kuchinashi's iron grip on the school. Naturally, a challenge to her rule bothers Kuchinashi, so she decides to get rid of him as soon as possible. Her plan? Get him in a honey trap. However, that's easier said than done, as she starts finding hidden aspects of herself that she didn't want to acknowledge, either to herself or to Tadashi.  
  
Will she prevail before her conscience eats her up from her own salacious taunts? Will Tadashi play into her hands? What manner of a person will he prove himself to be when facing her taunts?
description.ja: 私ばっかりもんもんするのは絶対おかしい‥‥。目障りな風紀委員・起立匡史(きりつただし)を退学させるため、口無椿(くちなしつばき)お嬢様はご自分のお色気でヤツを陥れることに。ですが、ナイスバディなお嬢様のお色気が起立に全く効きません。逆に、椿様の方がもんもんしてしまうのです。

title.en: After Becoming Everyone's Favorite, I Went on a Killing Spree

altTitles.zh: 成为团宠后，我大杀四方

description.en: Growing up as an orphan in the arena, Ora was determined to awaken her summoner bloodline and gain immense power. However, her world turns upside down when she learns that the king has taken her loyal companion, Dragong, putting him in grave danger. In a daring escape, Ora and Dragong flee together, embarking on a series of thrilling adventures. Along the way, Ora hones her strength and resilience, while meticulously planning her revenge against those who have wronged her.

altTitles.ja: 負けヒロインが多すぎる！@comic

altTitles.vi: Có Quá Nhiều Nữ Chính Thua Cuộc! @comic

description.en:
***“Huh? Who are you calling losing?”***

As the background of the class, I, Kazuhiko Nukumizu, witnessed a popular girl–Anna Yanami, getting rejected by another guy.

_“Even though he said we’ll get married. Don’t you think he’s pretty mean?”
“When did he say that?”
“When we were 4 or 5 years old.”_

That doesn’t count, right? With this, the losing heroines like Remon Yakishio from the Track and Field Club, and Chika Komari, from the literature club.

_“Nukumizu-kun. There are two types of girls. Childhood friends or cheating cats.”
“I see. Well, that’s a bold statement.”_

There’s a fortune for those who shine only after losing. Losing Heroines—The curtain to the mysterious coming-of-age story “Makeine” opens now!
___
**Character Designer:** [Imigimuru](https://mangadex.org/author/341a08ca-acbf-49a3-998a-d3451249ec43)

**Additional Links:**  
- [Official LN (JP)](https://www.shogakukan.co.jp/books/09453017)
- [Alternative Raw](https://shogakukan-comic.jp/book-series?cd=51545)
description.ja:
クラスの背景モブ高校生こと温水和彦は、男子に人気のクラスメート・八奈見杏菜が幼馴染にフラれるのを目撃してしまう。
仕方なく八奈見を慰める温水だが、それをきっかけに、様々な負け感あふれる女子たちに絡まれることになり――!?
負けヒロイン――マケインたちと辿る謎の青春が、ここに幕を開ける！
負けてこそ輝く彼女たちに、幸いあれ。
description.vi:
“Hử? Cậu gọi ai là đồ thua cuộc cơ?”

Tôi, Kazuhiko Nukumizu, một nhân vật làm nền trong lớp, chứng kiến cảnh cô nàng nổi tiếng – Anna Yanami bị một nam sinh khác từ chối.

“Dù cho cậu ấy đã từng nói bọn mình sẽ kết hôn đấy. Cậu có thấy cậu ấy quá đáng không?”

“Cậu ấy nói thế vào lúc nào vậy?”

“Hồi bọn tớ 4 hay 5 tuổi gì đó.”

Thế thì đâu có tính?

Cùng với cô nàng còn có những nữ chính thua cuộc khác như Remon Yakishio của Câu lạc bộ Điền kinh và Komari Chika từ Câu lạc bộ Văn học.

“Nukumizu-kun nè, trên đời có hai loại con gái. Một là bạn thuở nhỏ, còn lại là đồ đàn bà giựt bồ.”

“Vậy hả. Chà, một tuyên bố đầy táo bạo ha.”

Có một loại vận mệnh rằng có những người chỉ thực sự toả sáng sau khi đã thua cuộc.

Những nữ chính thua cuộc—Bức màn câu chuyện tuổi mới lớn mang tên “Makein” sẽ lật mở ngay bây giờ!
description.es-la: "¿Eh? ¿A quién llamas perdedor?" Como fondo de la clase, yo, Kazuhiko Nukumizu, fui testigo de cómo una chica popular -Anna Yanami- era rechazada por otro chico. "Aunque dijo que nos casaríamos. ¿No crees que es bastante malo?" "¿Cuándo dijo eso?" "Cuando teníamos 4 o 5 años". Eso no cuenta, ¿verdad? Con esto, las heroínas perdedoras como Remon Yakishio del Club de Atletismo, y Chika Komari, del club de literatura. "Nukumizu-kun. Hay dos tipos de chicas. Las amigas de la infancia o las gatas tramposas". "Ya veo. Bueno, esa es una declaración audaz". Hay una fortuna para los que brillan sólo después de perder. ¡Heroínas perdedoras-El telón de la misteriosa historia de madurez "Makeine" se abre ahora! ["Makeine" es la abreviación del nombre del manga]
description.pt-br:
"Hã? Quem você está chamando de perdedor?

Como pano de fundo da aula, eu, Kazuhiko Nukumizu, testemunhei uma garota popular, Anna Yanami, sendo rejeitada por outro cara.

“Mesmo que ele tenha dito que vamos nos casar. Você não acha que ele é muito mau?
"Quando ele disse isso?"
“Quando tínhamos 4 ou 5 anos.”

Isso não conta, certo? Com isso, perdem heroínas como Remon Yakishio, do Clube de Atletismo, e Chika Komari, do clube de literatura.

“Nukumizu-kun. Existem dois tipos de garotas. Amigos de infância ou gatos traidores.”
"Eu vejo. Bem, essa é uma afirmação ousada.”

Há fortuna para quem só brilha depois de perder. Perdendo Heroínas – A cortina para a misteriosa história de maioridade “Makeine” abre agora!

altTitles.th: นายเงือกของเดซาโรว

description.en:
Desharow, a Biology student at the Russian Maritime Academy, embarked on a long distance voyage with his mentor, Rhine, where the two caught a mysterious black scaled merman in Iceland. Little did he know that this mysterious black and evil creature had long viewed him as his prey…

Official Translations:
[Official Korean Translation](https://www.peanutoon.com/ko/comic/detail/11357)
A cute rice ball team explains poetry in 4 panel comics.

altTitles.ja: レベル200最強盗賊の覚醒～終末世界で暴れ狂ってやる～

description.en: A storm of the universe brought species mutations. The poison, undead, giants and monsters in the city roared as they waved their weapons. As the beasts in the woods fought over territorial rights, humans, too, awakened an ability known as star power… Zhou Zheng, without star power, traversed to this apocalyptic world. Using the abilities of the thief character in the game, he destroys the darkness and fog, seeking supreme power!
description.fr:
Un mouvement dans l'univers a apporté des mutations au niveau des espèces vivantes. Un poison, des morts vivants, des géants et des monstres rugissent dans la ville en agitant leurs armes. Alors que des bêtes dans les bois se battent pour des territoires, certains humains éveillent une capacité spéciale connue sous le nom de pouvoir des étoiles... Zhou Zheng, déficient de ce pouvoir, va traverser ce nouveau monde post apocalyptique.
Utilisant ses capacités de voleur issue d'un autre jeu, il détruit ténèbres et brouillard, à la recherche du pouvoir suprême !
description.zh: 一场宇宙风暴带来了物种的变异。城市中的毒尸巨怪，挥动着战斧咆哮。丛林中的异兽们，争夺着领地的主权。人类也觉醒了一种名为星力的异能……没有星力的周正穿越到这个末世。利用游戏中盗贼的角色能力，他将撕毁黑暗迷雾，追逐至高的力量！

altTitles.zh: 我成了反派大佬的小娇妻

description.en: The dainty flower idol Chen Cong Rong unluckily fell into a trap and awoke to a stunning naked man in her bed! Hahaha, is it okay to be with such a beautiful man? Hang on… Are you telling me I've switched places with the toxic, evil, and manipulative side character who won’t even survive 20% of the plot?! No, I'm definitely not ready to die!! Watch as I keep on living my ideal life!

altTitles.es: El esclavo de la élite de soldados de Mato

altTitles.en: Slave of the Magic Capital's Elite Troops

description.en:
The demon-filled dimension known as "Mato" has opened to threaten humanity, and a type of "peach" tree that grows there yields fruit that confers special powers to those who eat it, giving humanity a fighting chance, but this only works for women. As such, as protectors of humanity, women rise in social status while men are relegated to second-class citizens scraping for basic occupation and acknowledgment.   
  
Cue Yuuki Wakura, a domestically crafty and laborious high school senior whose older sister was taken during a Mato event 5 years before; while lamenting the hardships of the life ahead of him, an event opens before him, and while being rescued from demons by Captain Kyouka of the Anti-Demon Corps, she confers him powers as her "slave" and turns him into a mighty beast mount that mows down the demons.   
  
However, there is a surprising price to pay for being her "slave"… and it's not him who has to pay it.
description.fr:
La dimension démoniaque connue sous le nom de "Mato" s'est ouverte pour menacer l'humanité, et une sorte de "pêcher" qui y pousse donne des fruits qui confèrent des pouvoirs spéciaux à ceux qui les mangent, donnant à l'humanité une chance de se battre, mais cela ne fonctionne que pour les femmes. Ainsi, en tant que protectrices de l'humanité, les femmes gagnent en statut social tandis que les hommes sont relégués à des citoyens de seconde zone qui se battent pour une occupation et une reconnaissance de base.  
  
Cue Yuuki Wakura, une lycéenne rusée et laborieuse dont la sœur aînée a été enlevée lors d'un événement du Mato 5 ans auparavant ; alors qu'elle se lamente sur les difficultés de la vie qui l'attend, un événement s'ouvre devant elle, et alors qu'elle est sauvée des démons par le capitaine Kyouka du Corps Anti-Démon, elle lui confère ses pouvoirs d'"esclave" et le transforme en un puissant monticule animal qui fauche les démons.  
  
Cependant, il y a un prix surprenant à payer pour être son "esclave"… et ce n'est pas lui qui doit le payer.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Artist's Twitter](https://twitter.com/takemura4hey/)
description.ru:
Эта боевая фентезийная манга повествует о нескольких героинях, что защищают людей в альтернативном пространстве, именуемом Мато (Город Демонов).  


---
description.pt-br:
A dimensão cheia de demônios conhecida como "Mato" se abriu para ameaçar a humanidade, e uma espécie de "pessegueiro" que ali cresce produz frutos que conferem poderes especiais a quem os come, dando à humanidade uma chance de lutar, mas isso só funciona para mulheres. Como tal, como protetoras da humanidade, as mulheres ascendem no estatuto social, enquanto os homens são relegados a cidadãos de segunda classe, em busca de uma ocupação básica e de reconhecimento.

 Yuuki Wakura é um estudante do último ano do ensino médio, astuto e trabalhoso, cuja irmã mais velha foi raptada durante um evento em Mato, 5 anos antes; enquanto lamenta as dificuldades da vida que tem pela frente, um evento se abre diante dele, e ao ser resgatado dos demônios pela Capitã Kyouka do Corpo Anti-Demônio, ela confere a ele poderes como seu "escravo" e o transforma em uma poderosa montaria bestial. que destrói os demônios.

No entanto, há um preço surpreendente a pagar por ele ser seu “escravo”… e não é ele quem tem que pagar.

title.en: Maken Tsukai no Moto Shounen Hei wa, Moto Teki Kanbu no Onee-san to Issho ni Ikitai

altTitles.ja-ro: Makendzukai no Moto Shounenhei wa, Moto Tekikanbu no Onee-san to Issho ni Ikitai
Maken Tsukai no Moto Shōnen Hei wa, Moto Teki Kanbu no Onēsan to Issho ni Ikitai

altTitles.ja: 魔剣使いの元少年兵は、元敵幹部のお姉さんと一緒に生きたい

altTitles.en: A Former Child Soldier Who Uses a Magic Sword Wants to Live With a Missy, the Former Enemy Leader

altTitles.id: Seorang Mantan Prajurit Laki-laki Pengguna Pedang Sakti, Ingin Tinggal Bersama Mbak-Mbak yang Mantan Pemimpin Musuh

altTitles.zh: 魔王女干部X勇者少年兵

altTitles.es-la: Un antiguo niño soldado con una espada mágica quiere vivir con su hermana, una antigua líder enemiga.

description.en:
Seto is an ex-boy soldier who was expelled from the party of heroes on his journey because of his ruthless and incomparable fighting style. The former leader of the Demon King's army, Satis, was kicked out after a series of failures.

The two "former" enemies decide to travel together to find a second life. Sometimes they go to hot springs, sometimes they sleep in the same bed, sometimes they are attacked by demons. But what do they find at the end of their journey when they lose their place in the world?

The road story of the (former) brave boy soldier and (former) demon lord's army leader's "rebirth"!
description.ja: 冷酷無比な戦いぶりを疎まれ、旅の途中で勇者パーティを追放された魔剣使いの元少年兵・セト。失敗続きで魔王軍を追い出された元幹部・サティス。“元”敵同士のふたりが第二の人生を探すため一緒に旅に出る。時には温泉に行ったり、一緒のベッドで寝たり――居場所を失くしたもの同士の“生き直し"ロードストーリー！
description.es-la: Seto es un ex-soldado que fue expulsado del grupo de héroes en su viaje debido a su despiadado e incomparable estilo de lucha. El antiguo líder del ejército del Rey Demonio, Satis, fue expulsado tras una serie de fracasos. Los dos "antiguos" enemigos emprenden juntos un viaje para encontrar una segunda vida. A veces van a las termas, a veces duermen en la misma cama... ¡Una historia de "renacimiento" para los que han perdido su lugar en el mundo!
description.pt-br:
"Seto é um ex-garoto soldado que foi expulso do grupo dos heróis em sua jornada por causa de seu estilo de luta impiedoso e incomparável. A ex-líder do exército do Rei Demônio, Satis, foi expulsa após uma série de fracassos.

Os dois "antes" inimigos decidem viajar juntos para encontrar uma segunda vida. Às vezes eles vão para fontes termais, às vezes dormem na mesma cama, às vezes são atacados por demônios. Mas o que eles encontram no final de sua viagem quando perdem seu lugar no mundo?

A história do "renascimento" do "antigo" herói e da antiga líder do exército do rei demônio!

title.en: Kiraware Majo to Karada ga Irekawatta Keredo, Watashi wa Kyou mo Genki ni Kurashiteimasu!

altTitles.ja: 嫌われ魔女と体が入れ替わったけれど、私は今日も元気に暮らしています！

altTitles.en: I Swapped Bodies With a Wicked Witch, but Today I'll Keep Having Fun!

description.en: A happy slow life begins with a switch! Marietta, princess of the snow country of Snewe, is trapped in a magic tower because she can't use magic. 8 years later, on her wedding day with the prince of the silver country, she thought she had succeeded in summoning a holy beast, but then... What appeared was...?
description.ja: 取り決めにより雪の国・スニューウから大国・ジルヴァラに輿入れしてきた王女・マリエッタ。しかし魔法が使えないマリエッタは塔に幽閉され、7年後に行われる聖獣召喚の儀式を成功させるため、ひたすら魔法の修行を強いられた。そして7年後見事に白い竜を召喚したマリエッタだが、次の瞬間謎の声にいざなわれ、気がつけば見知らぬ場所にいた。しかも見た目はそっくりなのに、どんな魔法も使えるほど魔力に溢れた身体になっていて…。

altTitles.vi: Lời tuyên án của Đức Mẹ

description.ar: بعد وفاة ابنها بطريقة مروعة، تكتشف والدتهُ تنمر الآخرين الشديد عليه، فعقدت العزم على معاقبة أولئك المتنمرين الذين أخذوا ابنها الحبيب منها، وبدأت العمل كممرضة في المدرسة
description.en: The Nagare family was a happy home of three people. However, their son Kiritaka was secretly bullied at school. Then, an incident occurs, and the mother Mari's love for her son goes out of control.
description.ne: आमाबुवा र छोरासहित ३ जनाको नागारे परिवारको खुसीको घर थियो। तर, उनीहरुको छोरा किरिताकालाई विद्यालयमा गोप्य रुपमा कुटपिट गरिएको थियो।  त्यसपछि, एउटा घटना घट्छ, र आमा मारियाको छोराप्रतिको माया अनियन्त्रित हुन्छ।
description.vi:
Một gia đình ba người những tưởng đang hạnh phúc, cho đến khi Kiritaka, người con trai duy nhất của Nagare Mari "tự sát" vì "quá đau khổ". Cho rằng bản thân đã vô tình dồn ép con trai yêu quý, Mari toang tìm đến cái chết, nhưng không... cô vô tình phát hiện ra sự thật con trai mình đã liên tục bị bắt nạt suốt một thời gian dài bởi những con quỷ đội lốt người tại trường học.
Và rồi tình thương con da diết của Mari... đã vượt ngoài tầm kiểm soát của trái tim cô.
description.es-la: La familia Nagare era un hogar feliz formado por tres personas. Sin embargo, su hijo Kiritaka sufría acoso escolar extremo en secreto. Entonces, ocurre un incidente que haría que el amor de la madre, Mari, se descontrolara por completo.

title.en: Ore ga Shuyaku na wake ga nai

altTitles.ja: 俺が主役なわけがない

altTitles.en: There's No Way I'm the Protagonist
I Can't Be the Main Character

description.en:
Its first chapter on twitter received over 65k likes! A BL comedy manga that sympathizes with BL lovers ☆

With a hobby of writing BL novels, Akiharu, a university student fudanshi who loves shipping, quickly approaches his favorite ship (a delusion)? His dream of becoming a wall that watches over them was fulfilled —— was what he thought, but one day a shocking truth from the mouth of the uke (a delusion)….! But reality is stranger than his delusions! This is a new era of a fudanshi's heartful comedy!!
Miyahara Chiko is a mysterious girl who never seems to talk to anyone and always wears a pair of headphones and a scarf. But what is she hiding behind that silent facade?

title.en: Arafoo Otoko no Isekai Tsuhan Seikatsu

altTitles.en: The Daily Life of a Middle-Aged Online Shopper in Another World

altTitles.ja: アラフォー男の異世界通販生活

altTitles.ja-ro: Around 40 Otoko no Isekai Tsuuhan Seikatsu

altTitles.zh-hk: 四十左右男的異世界網購生活

altTitles.en: The Mail Order Life of a Man Around 40 in Another World

altTitles.zh: 中年男的异世界网购生活

altTitles.pt-br: A vida por correspondência de um homem de cerca de 40 anos em outro mundo

description.en:
The story of a middle aged man doing whatever he wants with the power of 1-click online shopping!  

Kenichi, a single man in his 40s, is transported into another world for no apparent reason. As he tries to escape a dangerous forest teaming with monsters, he realizes he has the power to access to a huge online store.

By using this power to exchange goods he found in this new world for cash, and then buying modern ones off the internet, he was able to quickly create a very popular business. However, his goal is to have a slow and leisurely life. Instead of growing his business even more, he decides to settle down and live off of the power of Jeff Bezos.

The mail order life of a middle aged man in other world begins now!

[web novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n2945eg/) (jp)

---
description.ru: История о мужчине средних лет, который делает все, что хочет, с помощью покупок в Интернете в один клик!
description.pt-br:
A história de um homem de meia idade fazendo o que quiser com o poder das compras online com um clique!
Kenichi, um homem solteiro de 40 anos, é transportado para outro mundo sem motivo aparente. Enquanto ele tenta escapar de uma floresta perigosa se unindo a monstros, ele percebe que tem o poder de acessar uma enorme loja online.

altTitles.en: Witches Bloom Under the Full Moon

description.en: Koichi Hotaka is a second-year junior high school student who is a bit of a shy. One day, he meets a mysterious girl, Shima, who calls herself the "Witch of Alstroemeria" and is chosen as her "contractor". A fantasy of love and magic set on the night of the full moon!
description.ja: 帆高航一（ほたか　こういち）はちょっとコジラセ気味な中学2年生。そんな彼はある日、「アルストロメリアの魔女」を名乗る謎の少女・紫麻（しま）と出会い、彼女の“契約者”に選ばれる。満月の夜を舞台に繰り広げられる、恋と魔法のファンタジー！
description.zh: 帆高航一是个有点内向的初二学生。某一天，他遇到了一个神秘的女孩紫麻，她自称“阿尔斯特罗梅里亚的女巫”，并被选为她的“契约者”。 在满月之夜缔结的爱情和魔法的幻想故事！

description.en: A story about an invincible samurai and a young princess that he has sworn to protect.

title.en: Watashi wo Center ni suru to Chikaimasu ka?

altTitles.ja: 私をセンターにすると誓いますか？

altTitles.en: Do You Swear to Center Me?

description.en:
"If you really can make me the center of the group... I'll marry you."

Mizuki Natsuno is the least popular member of the idol group "Melty Strawberry." Koichi Okuda is the only person in the world who continues to support Mizuki. Two people who should never be connected, end up in a cooperative relationship under one roof, working her way up from the bottom of the ranks to become the leader of the group.

A story about the "Japanese Dream" begins, as they work together as a team to reach stardom in the entertainment world!
description.pt-br:
"Se você realmente puder me tornar o centro do grupo... eu me casarei com você."

Mizuki Natsuno é a membra menos popular do grupo ídolo "Melty Strawberry". Koichi Okuda é a única pessoa no mundo que continua apoiando Mizuki. Duas pessoas que nunca deveriam estar conectadas acabam em um relacionamento cooperativo sob o mesmo teto, subindo da base da hierarquia para se tornarem os líderes do grupo.

Começa uma história sobre o “Sonho Japonês”, enquanto eles trabalham juntos como uma equipe para alcançar o estrelato no mundo do entretenimento!

title.en: GIRLS und PANZER das FINALE - Continuation High School’s Starving Art of Dining

altTitles.ja-ro: GIRLS und PANZER das FINALE: Keizoku Koukou Harapeko Shokujidou

altTitles.ja: ガールズ&パンツァー 最終章 継続高校はらぺこ食事道

description.en:
Senshado. The number one tank warfare martial art. With a philosophy to hone a maiden's polite grace, dignity, and femininity, it has been regarded as the choice for maidens across the world.  
  
But to those that choose to master it… They must first follow another path:  
  
The Art of DINING.  
  
Maintenance, training, and frequent expeditions. These duties lower morale, so in order to boost our spirits…  
  
We eat.  
  
Many say that this is linked to victory within Senshado. Called, "Shokujido". For some teams, that is what they've named it…  
  
However, for Continuation High School, they have always struggled with "Dining".  
  
From the popular anime series, Girls und Panzer, comes its first cooking comic!!!  
  
For the economically struggling Continuation High School, Mika, Mikko, and Aki have set their sights on the foods of other schools!

The conquest story of the final boss protagonist begins here!

"Boot Hour, Shoot Curse" is a VRMMORPG that has no concept of levels or professions. Instead, players must farm experience points to gain new skills and increase their status.
Rare, a girl who participated in the closed beta test, has acquired the hidden skill "Subordinate", which allows her to turn NPCs into her subordinates. The skill also transfers the experience points gained by the subordinates to Rare.

She used the skill to gradually add new NPCs she encountered to her party. As a result of the unprecedented amount of experience gained from her minions, she was able to evolve into a Demon Lord.
description.fr:
L’histoire de la conquête du boss final commence ici !

« Boot Hour, Shoot Curse » est un VRMMORPG qui n’a ni de concept de niveaux ni de métiers. Au lieu de cela, les joueurs doivent accumuler des points d’expérience pour acquérir de nouvelles compétences et améliorer leur statut et leur personnage.
Rare, une jeune fille qui a participé aux tests de la version bêta fermée, a acquis la compétence cachée « Subordonné », qui lui permet de transformer des PNJ en ses subordonnés. Cette compétence transfère également les points d’expérience gagnés par les subordonnés à Rare.
Elle a utilisé cette compétence pour ajouter progressivement à son groupe de nouveaux PNJ qu’elle rencontrait. Et grâce à la quantité d’expérience accumulée par ses subordonnés, elle a pu devenir un Roi Démon
description.ja:
新作VRMMORPG『Boot hour, shoot curse』のオープンβテストに参加した主人公レアが手に入れたのは、隠しスキル『使役』。
ゲームならよくある【レベル】や【ジョブ】というシステムが存在しない代わりに、獲得した【経験値】を使ってスキルを取得したり、ステータスを上昇させたりするこのゲームにおいて、「眷属化したキャラの獲得経験値をすべて自分に集約する」という『使役』はとんでもないスキルだった。

レアは、『使役』を使って出会ったNPCや魔物を次々眷属化。増え続ける【経験値】で自身と配下を強化し続けた結果、いつの間にか「特定災害生物『魔王』」の判定を受けてしまい…!?

ラスボス級主人公によるVRMMO征服譚、ここに開幕!!

title.en: Elf to Bike to Teikoku Chiri Chousain to

altTitles.ja: エルフとバイクと帝国地理調査員と

altTitles.en: Elf and Bike and Imperial Geographic Surveyor and…

description.en: Road-movie-like manga about the perky elf and her rugged sidekick, who explores and maps an area where the situation is unclear. -AMAZ
description.ja: 帝国地理院の調査員の助手をしているエルフのノノアはバイクを駆り、相棒のカゴ―と2人で大きく変わってしまった、魑魅魍魎が跋扈する地方の街道沿いを調査。地図を更新する仕事をしていた。休息がてら泉で水浴びするノノアだが、その前に現われたのは…!?

description.en: A human girl secretly raised by robots starts to uncover the dark secrets behind her lush, utopian world where humanity has all but vanished.

altTitles.ja: 東京クレーターのアカリ

description.en: 25 years ago, a meteor struck Tokyo, creating a flooded crater and messing up the ecosystem. Now, the city's overrun with a weird virus and mutant creatures. Here comes Akari, a badass local cop who zips around on her trusty bike, Chrome, keeping the peace and protecting the citizens in this crazy submerged Tokyo.

One day, average salaryman Yamai Zenjirou has an out-of-this-world experience—literally! He's pulled from Earth and dragged to another world where magic thrives and a gorgeous, powerful queen needs a consort. Now he's being pressured to marry that very monarch and help her bear a child. Will Zenjirou accept this life of lazy, luxurious love at the cost of leaving his home behind?
description.ja:
**異世界で巨乳の褐色女王とグータラ生活！？？**

月平均残業時間150時間オーバーの半ブラック企業に勤める山井善治郎は、気がつくと異世界に召喚されていた。善治郎を召喚したのは、善治郎の好みストライクど真ん中な、褐色の爆乳美女。「ようこそ、婿殿」と、いきなり結婚を申し込む異世界の女王様に善治郎の出した結論は……。 サラリーマンが異世界の王族となり、ぐーたらなヒモ生活を謳歌!? 「小説家になろう」で年間ランキング1位を獲得した人気作が待望のコミック化！
description.pt-br:
382 / 5.000
Um dia, o assalariado médio Yamai Zenjirou tem uma experiência de outro mundo - literalmente! Ele é retirado da Terra e arrastado para outro mundo onde a magia prospera e uma rainha linda e poderosa precisa de um consorte. Agora ele está sendo pressionado a se casar com aquela mesma monarca e ajudá-la a ter um filho. Zenjirou aceitará esta vida de amor preguiçoso e luxuoso ao custo de deixar sua casa para trás?

title.en: The Story of How the Girl of My Dreams Was a Stalker

altTitles.ja: 憧れのあの子がストーカーだった話

altTitles.ja-ro: Akogare no Ano Ko ga Stalker Datta Hanashi

altTitles.es-la: La historia de cómo la chica de mis sueños era una acosadora

description.en:
The story of how the girl of my dreams was a stalker.

Manga by Twitter user @ku-sunok1
description.es-la: Manga del usuario de Twitter @ku_sunok1, el título es también sinopsis.

description.en: When Sora enters high school, his homeroom teacher is a sexy gal with huge breasts and she’s none other than the changed version of Suzune, the innocent girl next door who was his first love! As the teacher’s “educational guidance” escalates day by day, Sora is awakened to pleasures he’s never known before…!
description.ja:
ドSギャルの体育教師に、俺が開発されていく‥‥っ！

高校に入学した宙＜そら＞の担任は、爆乳で超セクシーな黒ギャル教師。それは、初恋の清楚な隣のお姉さん・すずねの変わり果てた姿だった！日々エスカレートする先生の「教育的指導」。宙は今まで知らなかった快感に目覚めてしまい‥‥！？

altTitles.ja: フィルター越しのカノジョ

description.en: Hakobe Narumi is an expressionless high schooler known as Stoney. The highlight of his unnoticeable existence is following posts from the popular selfie poster "Efa" on social media. But it turns out "Efa" is his studious and popular classmate Mitsuha Koto?! The slightly erotic, adolescent, selfie, romantic comedy between an Iron Walled Selfie girl and a stone-faced boy begins!
description.ja: つねに無表情な能面高校生・箱部成海。クラスでも存在感激うすな彼の人生の楽しみは、SNSで人気のえっちな自撮り女子「えふぁ」の投稿を追いかけること。しかし、その「えふぁ」の正体が、真面目で誰からも好かれるクラスメイトの三葉琴であることを知ってしまいーー⁉︎鉄壁自撮り女子✖️能面男子のちょっとえっちな青春自撮りラブコメ開幕‼︎
description.ru: Хакобэ Наруми — невыразительный старшеклассник по прозвищу «Каменнолицый». Его незаметное существование состоит в том, что он следит за постами популярного эротического аккаунта «Эфа» в соцсетях. Но оказывается, что «Эфа» — это его одноклассница Мицуха Кото! Начинается слегка эротическая, подростковая, селфи-романтическая комедия между селфи-девочкой с железной стеной и парнем с каменным лицом!

title.en: Kanojo ni Uwaki Sareteita Ore ga, Koakuma na Kouhai ni Natsukareteimasu

altTitles.en: I Was Cheated On by My Girlfriend, but My Devilish Junior Now Yearns for Me

altTitles.ja: カノジョに浮気されていた俺が、小悪魔な後輩に懐かれています

altTitles.en: My Coquettish Junior Attaches Herself to Me!

description.en:
Christmas season.

Hasegawa Yuuta found himself single after breaking up last month when his girlfriend had cheated on him. And it was only a few days until Christmas! After an everyday conversation with his female friend, Mino Ayaka, Yuuta met a beautiful girl clad in a Santa suit—In a lane full of couples no less!
Her name was Shinohara Mayu. Will this encounter with Shinohara turn out to be the Christmas present for Yuuta?
description.pt-br:
Época Natalina.

Hasegawa Yuuta se viu solteiro após terminar o namoro no mês passado, quando sua namorada o traiu. E faltavam apenas alguns dias para o Natal! Depois de uma conversa normal com sua amiga Mino Ayaka, Yuuta conheceu uma linda garota vestida de Papai Noel - em uma rua cheia de casais!

Seu nome era Shinohara Mayu. Será que esse encontro com Shinohara será o presente de Natal para Yuuta?

title.en: The Blood Princess and the Knight

description.en:
I, who was a sacred knight, was defeated and captured in a battle against the vampire clan.   
"Oh? Letting you die? In your dreams! Accept my embrace, and in the future, please take care of me, my lovely daughter~"   
The silver-haired Queen of the Vampire Clan lifted my chin and smiled cunningly, her sharp canines drawing closer to my neck…  


---

- [Alternative raw (AC QQ)](https://ac.qq.com/Comic/comicInfo/id/648136)
- [Alternative raw (Bilibili)](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc28199)

altTitles.ja: まんきつしたい常連さん

altTitles.en: Miss Regular Customer Wants to Enjoy
The Regular Enjoying Herself at the Manga Cafe

altTitles.zh-hk: 想盡情享受的常客小姐

altTitles.zh: 想尽情享受的常客小姐

description.en:
Izumi, a university student part-timing at a manga cafe, got curious about a regular customer. Her name is Honami, a high school girl who's been coming to the manga cafe recently. This defenseless and seemingly cute girl who he can't take his eyes off of has a secret...!?

This is a slightly naughty, heartful love comedy where this gentle pair will get to "enjoy" their youth to the fullest!!
description.ja:
マンガ喫茶で働く大学生・泉には気になっている常連さんがいた。 それは最近よく来店する女子高生のほなみちゃん。 どこか無防備で可愛らしい彼女には、 目を離せないある秘め事があって…！？ 青春を“まんきつ”する優しいふたりの ちょっとエッチなハートフルラブコメ！！

---

Manga kissa de hataraku daigakusei izumi ni wa ki ni natte iru jōren-san ga ita. Sore wa saikin yoku raiten suru mesukōsei no hona michan. Doko ka mubōbi de kawairashī kanojo ni wa,-me o hanasenai aru himegoto ga atte…!? Seishun o “ma n kitsu” suru yasashī futari no chottoetchina hātofururabukome!!
description.es-la: Izumi, un estudiante universitario que trabaja en un café de manga, tiene una clienta habitual que le interesa. Se trata de una chica de instituto, Honami, que últimamente frecuenta la tienda. ¡Su aspecto es algo inocente y tierno, pero tiene un secreto del que no puede apartar la vista...! ¡Una comedia romántica un poco atrevida sobre dos personas amables que disfrutan plenamente su juventud!
description.pt-br:
Izumi, um estudante universitário que trabalha meio período em um café de mangá, ficou curioso sobre uma cliente regular. O nome dela é Honami, uma estudante do ensino médio que tem vindo ao café mangá recentemente. Essa garota indefesa e aparentemente fofa de quem ele não consegue tirar os olhos tem um segredo...!?

Esta é uma comédia de amor um pouco safada e sincera, onde este gentil casal poderá "aproveitar" sua juventude ao máximo!!

title.en: Douse Suterareru no nara, Saigo ni Suki ni Sasete Itadakimasu

altTitles.ja: どうせ捨てられるのなら、最後に好きにさせていただきます

altTitles.en: With a Strong-Willed Marchioness, Prince Yandere's Love Offensive
Before You Discard Me, I Shall Have My Way With You

altTitles.es-la: Si de todos modos vas a dejarme, haré que me ames hasta el final

description.en: Agnès has been engaged in an arranged, political engagement with Lucile since childhood and fell in love with him upon meeting him. Lucile however does not return these feelings and sees the marriage as purely political. Now adults, Lucile wishes to break off engagements and marry the one he truly loves, Agnès however will not go down so easily.
description.ja: 侯爵令嬢アニエスは、長年の片恋の相手であり婚約者である王太子・リュシリュールに婚約破棄を告げられる。彼の隣には恋敵の姿が。どうせ愛されることはないのであれば、捨てられ虐げられることしかないのであれば、だったら最後に……。家を、そして自らの自由と矜持を守るために取ったあるとんでもない行動で、しかし何故かアニエスはリュシリュールに執着されてしまう。意地っ張りで素直になれない二人の、縺れに縺れた恋の行方は……――？気が強い侯爵令嬢×拗らせヤンデレ王太子、意地っ張りな二人のすれ違いラブロマンス。

description.en: Tsukasa, a college student, is rescued from an attack by a devil, one of many vampires that can blend in among the human population. Anzai, her savior, is a half-devil who exploits his supernatural gifts as a member of a shadowy police task force that specializes in devil-related crime in Tokyo. As Anzai continues to keep guard over Tsukasa, the two quickly forge a tentative bond—one that Anzai fears will test his iron-clad rule of never drinking human blood…

altTitles.es: La hija más querida del villano

altTitles.th: บุตรสาวผู้ล้ำค่าของวายร้าย

altTitles.vi: Đứa Con Gái Quý Giá Của Nhân Vật Phản Diện
Cô Công Chúa Nhỏ Của Kẻ Phản Diện

description.en:
My name is Rosaria von Valencia, but I didn't always have this name. According to a book I read, I'm supposed to be murdered in place of the saint, Cordelia, just because I look like her. I decided to run away to avoid ever meeting my future killer, Duke Valencia, but ended up running into him as he was on the brink of death. After I saved him in the hopes of being spared, he adopted me as his daughter! Now that my new dad's spoiling me with love, does this mean I'll get to live until the end?

---
It's already unfair that I suffered greatly because I closely resembled the saint, but why did the villain kill me without any mercy at all? No, actually, it said in the book that I was really bound to die. 'My life is already ruined. Of all things, why do I have to be the one to die a ridiculous death?' There's still hope! I haven't met any of the characters yet so I'll just run away! But why did the villain collapse in front of me...?

With a lot of effort, I barely saved the life of the villain who was on the brink of death. But now he's saying that he wanted to adopt me as his daughter and raise me to be a saint?! Just like that, I decided to become his daughter for a few days before leaving quietly.

"My daughter is a genius. There's no child who is more angelic in this world other than my daughter."

...I think I have coaxed my dad too well. Even the guys who originally followed the real saint started to pay attention to me. What went wrong? Aren't you guys supposed to hate me?!

---

description.es:
Ya es injusto que sufrí mucho porque me parezco mucho a la Santa, pero ¿por qué el villano me mató sin piedad?No, en realidad, decía en el libro que estaba destinado a morir.'Mi vida ya está arruinada. De todas las cosas, ¿por qué tengo que ser yo quien tenga una muerte ridícula?¡Todavía hay esperanza! Todavía no he conocido a ninguno de los personajes, ¡así que me escaparé!Pero, ¿por qué el villano colapsó frente a mí...?Con mucho esfuerzo, apenas salvé la vida del villano que estaba al borde de la muerte.¡¿Pero ahora dice que quería adoptarme como su hija y criarme para ser una Santa?!Así como así, decidí convertirme en su hija por unos días antes de irme en silencio.—Mi hija es un genio. No hay niña más angelical en este mundo que mi hija.…Creo que he engatusado a mi padre demasiado bien.Incluso los chicos que originalmente seguían a la verdadera Santa empezaron a prestarme atención.¿Qué salió mal? ¡¿No se supone que ustedes me odian?!

description.id:
Namaku Cordelia, sama seperti nama saintess yang parasnya juga mirip sekali denganku. Menurut buku yang aku baca, di masa depan nanti aku akan mati di tangan seorang duke yang salah mengiraku sebagai saintess. Aku bermaksud untuk kabur dari takdir itu, tapi aku malah bertemu dengan sang duke jahat dan dia mengangkatku sebagai anaknya! "Tidak masalah kan kalau aku jadi anak angkatnya sebentar?" Apakah aku akan bernasib sama isi buku itu? Omong-omong, aku baca di mana ya buku itu?

description.ko:
성녀와 닮았다는 이유로 납치당한 것도 억울한데
악당은 가차 없이 나를 죽였다.

아니, 그렇게 죽을 거라고 책에 쓰여 있었다.

‘이번 생은 망했어. 하필이면 어이없이 죽는 역할이야?’

아직 희망은 있었다.
등장인물들과 아무도 만나지 않은 지금, 도망쳐야 한다!
그런데 왜 악당이 내 앞에 쓰러져 있지……?

죽을 고비에서 겨우 악당을 구했더니
이젠 그가 성녀가 될 재목이라며 나를 딸로 입양했다?!
기왕 이렇게 된 거, 며칠 딸 노릇 하다가 조용히 떠나려고 했는데

“내 딸은 천재다. 내 딸처럼 천사 같은 아이는 이 세상에 없지.”

……아빠를 너무 잘 꼬셔 버린 것 같다.

심지어 진짜 성녀를 따라다니던 남자들도 내게 관심을 갖기 시작했다.

왜 이래? 나 너희들 싫거든?!

Я знала, что моя судьба быть похищенной и убитой потому что мы со святой похожи.
Планировала сбежать до того, как снова встречусь с злым герцогом, но...
Не могу поверить, что я упала у него на глазах!
И он даже спас меня от смерти и удочерил!
Несколько дней я старалась играть в хорошего ребенка, но неожиданно герцог становился дураком, зависимый от своей дочери...

description.sk:
Volám sa Rosaria von Valencia, ale nie vždy som sa tak volala. Podľa knihy, ktorú som čítala, ma mali zavraždiť namiesto svätice Cordelie len preto, že sa na ňu podobám. Rozhodla som sa utiecť, aby som sa nikdy nestretla so svojím budúcim vrahom, vojvodom Valenciom, ale nakoniec som naňho narazila, keď bol na pokraji smrti. Po tom, čo som ho zachránila v nádeji, že ma v budúcnosti ušetrí, si ma adoptoval za svoju dcéru! Teraz, keď ma môj nový otec rozmaznáva láskou, znamená to, že budem žiť až do konca?

description.vi:
Vì gần giống với Thánh nữ mà chịu nhiều đau khổ, đã là rất bất công rồi, nhưng sao nhân vật phản diện lại xuống tay với mình không một chút thương sót chứ?

Không, thật ra, ở trong sách, mình sẽ chết như vậy.

“Cuộc đời mình bị huỷ hoại cả rồi. Sau tất cả, sao mình lại phải chịu một cái chết lố bịch như vậy chứ?”

Mình vẫn còn cơ hội! Mình vẫn chưa chạm mặt bất kì nhân vật nào nên mình sẽ bỏ chạy!

Nhưng sao nhân vật phản diện lại đổ gục trước mắt mình…?

Mình đã rất cố gắng để cứu sống nhân vật phản diện đang cận kề cái chết.

Nhưng anh ta nói muốn nhận mình làm con gái và nuôi dạy mình trở thành Thánh nữ?!

Và như thế, mình đồng ý trở thành con gái của anh ta vài ngày trước khi lẳng lặng rời đi.

“Con gái ta là thiên tài. Không có đứa trẻ nào trên thế giới này hơn được con gái ta đâu.”…Mình nghĩ mình nịnh cha rất tốt đó.

Ngay cả những người lúc đầu đi theo vị Thánh nữ thật cũng bắt đầu để ý đến mình.

Chuyện gì đây? Chẳng phải họ ghét mình á?

description.en:
A young priestess has formed her first adventuring party, but almost immediately they find themselves in distress. Luckily for her, the Goblin Slayer chose that place as his next killing grounds–a man who's dedicated his life to the extermination of all goblins, by any means necessary. And when rumors of his feats begin to circulate, there's no telling who might come calling next.  

**NOTE:**   
- There are *currently* no English scanlations of this manga. The chapters on the net are the official YenPress chapters.  
As long as they **(YenPress' chapters)** are in publication they are not allowed on MangaDex.  
  
**Links:**  
- [Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/GoblinSlayer_GA)  
- [Official LN (JP)](https://ga.sbcr.jp/sp/goblin_slayer/)  
- [Official Anime (JP)](http://www.goblinslayer.jp/)
description.pt: Uma sacerdotisa formou seu primeiro grupo de aventureiros, mas, quase imediatamente se encontram em apuros pelos goblins. E o Goblin Slayer é quem vem ao resgate – um homem que tem dedicado sua vida a exterminação de todos os goblins, através de qualquer meio necessário.
description.ru: Юная жрица вместе со своей командой впервые отправилась на поиски приключений, но они тут же попали в беду. На помощь им приходит Убийца Гоблинов – таинственный мечник, посвятивший свою жизнь уничтожению всех гоблинов любыми средствами. В итоге девушка присоединяется к нему в постоянном походе против всевозможных пород гоблинов, в котором сталкивается с новыми тайнами, врагами, друзьями, а иногда и конкурентками.
description.pt-br: Um homem deseja tornar-se um “aventureiro”, cujo lema é: “Eu não vou salvar o mundo, eu apenas vou matar goblins.” Após ouvir rumores sobre ele, uma elfa se aproxima dele com um pedido.

description.en:
"The deadline is six months, within which you must kill your husband."

On the first night of their marriage, I possessed the body of 'Alice,' a villainous supporting character who was ordered by her mother-in-law to kill her husband.

I thought I was married off to a duke who's a living  corpse for the sake of money, but lo and behold, this duke has a great body and is handsome as well. Instead of killing him, I looked for a way to survive by using divine power instead of poison.

"Mother, I will become a priestess for the duke!
As a priestess, I shall pray for the duke's well-being for the rest of my life!"

On the day I was about to leave the duke's mansion, my husband who had been unconscious suddenly woke up.

"You're the one who brought me out of the darkness, so take responsibility."

He wakes up and demands I take responsibility after saving him?

A boyish childhood friend grows up to be a super handsome girl!

description.ja: 椛 智明(かんば ともあき)はボーイッシュな幼なじみ、立華 一颯(たちばな いぶき)に憧れ、彼女より「もっとカッコよくなる」と約束をする。しかし４年が経ち、一颯はさらに超イケメン女子に成長!! 二人の関係は埋まらない12センチの身長差と同じく、変わらない…？

description.en: After performing in their final middle school judo tournament, Michi and Sanae begin high school and walk in on Michi's final opponent fighting to save their new high school's judo club.

"Will this make you happy?" Namwoo wakes up one night to find bills sprawled all over his room - along with the hazy memory of a handsome stranger. Even in his wildest dreams, all Namwoo wants is to have enough money to survive each month. Si-eon, on the other hand, has everything he could ever want except happiness. Intrigued by Namwoo's humble wishes, Si-eon offers him the money he wants - the catch being, he has to date him.

Yejun, who had always believed he was a beta, found himself unexpectedly in the throes of heat, resulting in the birth of his child during college five years ago - a consequence of his complicated relationship with Do-yoon, his unrequited first love and friends-with-benefits partner. Returning to Korea, Yejun decides to bear the sole responsibility of raising his son in secrecy, keeping the truth hidden from Do-yoon. However, five years later, Yejun crosses paths with the child’s father at his workplace - a long-overdue meeting that he had hoped to delay for as long as possible.
description.pl: Yejun, który zawsze wierzył, że jest beta, niespodziewanie znalazł się w rui, co zaowocowało narodzinami jego dziecka podczas studiów pięć lat temu - konsekwencją jego skomplikowanego związku z Do-yoon, nieodwzajemnionej pierwszej miłości i przyjaźni z korzyściami. Po powrocie do Korei Yejun postanawia wziąć na siebie całkowitą odpowiedzialność za wychowanie syna w tajemnicy, ukrywając prawdę przed Do-yoon. Jednak pięć lat później Yejun spotyka ojca dziecka w swoim miejscu pracy - spotkanie, które miał nadzieję odwlekać tak długo, jak to tylko możliwe.

description.en:
“Until the day humanity falls.”

In the year 2020, Earth’s magnetic poles disappeared and humankind was nearly wiped out by cosmic radiation. Within the span of a hundred years, living creatures began to mutate and devour each other while the remaining humans, numbering in the tens of thousands, struggled bitterly in their man-made bases.

In the Abyss, home to the mutated xenogenics, there lived a sentient little mushroom. Because it had been nourished by the blood and flesh of the deceased human An Ze, not only did it take on a similar-looking human form, but a similar name as well: An Zhe.

An Zhe is determined to go to the human base to search for his spore, which had been harvested by humans. Once there, however, he faces the omnipresent risk of discovery and certain death as he tries to keep his non-human nature hidden from the Judges, whose responsibility is to inspect for and eliminate xenogenics like himself. And of all the Judges, Colonel Lu Feng is the most perceptive and merciless—as soon as he determines that someone is a xenogenic, he will execute that person on the spot.

But An Zhe’s mutation goes undetected by Lu Feng’s eyes, and so a tale of humans and xenogenics unfolds…

Silver Award winner at the 12th Chinese Nebula Awards for Chinese Science Fiction.
description.pl:
Ponury i niegościnny świat po katastrofie ekologicznej. Spustoszoną ziemię bombarduje promieniowanie kosmiczne. Niedobitki ludzkości schroniły się w dwóch ostatnich ocalałych bazach, desperacko próbując przetrwać. Każdy kontakt z obcym organizmem żywym grozi skażeniem genetycznym.

Do bazy ludzi trafia zagubiony chłopak, który w rzeczywistości nie jest nawet człowiekiem. Los styka go z bezlitosnym sędzią, wyszkolonym do tropienia i likwidowania mutantów. Niespodziewanie ich znajomość przeradza się w coś więcej…

Polskie tłumaczenie powieści dostępne tutaj: https://www.wattpad.com/story/251281478-little-mushroom

description.en:
While trailing someone, the poor detective Sousuke Kaburagi runs into Sara, an imperial princess from another world who uses black magic. Sousuke and Sara gradually begin living together, but in the blink of an eye, Sara becomes accustomed to modern-day Japan...

Meanwhile, Livia—a female knight who transferred to the world after Sara, is enjoying a surprisingly pleasant life, even though she is homeless. The two otherworldly individuals who live a pleasant and strong life influence Sousuke and the other oddballs who live here, such as a devilish lawyer, a divorce agent, and a cult leader. 

---

**Links:** 
- [Official LN (JP)](https://www.shogakukan.co.jp/books/09453038)
description.ja:
異世界の皇女、岐阜で無双！？

貧乏探偵・鏑矢惣助は、尾行中に天から降ってきた金髪の美少女・サラに遭遇。
彼女は自身を異世界の皇女だと言い、とんでもない魔術を披露する。
なし崩し的に惣助の家に居候することになったサラは、
なぜか探偵の仕事に興味を持ちはじめ…？
サラの従者である女騎士・リヴィアをはじめ、変わり者たちが続々登場！
岐阜を舞台に贈る、天下無双の群像喜劇！！

title.en: Miss Wolf and Her Fox Sister

altTitles.zh: 狼小姐和她的狐狸妹妹

description.en: [Savage Wolf X Cunning Fox] In the modern therianthrope world, everyone respects the law of the jungle where the strong prey on the weak. Twenty-year-old Yu Wenxi, as a gray wolf therianthrope, stands at the top of the food chain. She has made a name for herself with her fists. She is violent and volatile, always looking down on the weak. Until one day, when her stepsister left a fox cub with her. From then on, the wild wolf turned into a good big dog. She vowed to raise the crybaby cub, train it into a model student, and give it the best that life has to offer. However, the little fox is hiding a wicked heart under the guise of a good girl...

title.en: My Wife Is From a Thousand Years Ago

altTitles.zh: 我家老婆来自一千年前

altTitles.zh-ro: Wojia Laopo Laizi Yiqian Nian Qian
Wǒjiā Lǎopó Láizì Yīqiān Nián Qián

altTitles.vi: Vợ Tôi Từ Một Ngàn Năm Trước
Bà Xã Nhà Tôi Đến Từ Ngàn Năm Trước

altTitles.fr: Ma femme vient d'il y a 1000 ans

description.en: Jiang He, a girl from the Tang Dynasty, traveled through a thousand years and appeared in front of Xu Qing. Fate brought together this love that spanned a thousand years. Everything the girl was familiar with has become history. Relatives, friends, and enemies have all been left behind 1,200 years ago. The boy is unreserved and leads the girl to start a new life. Pain, confusion, cheers, and laughter will remain in this new world.
